links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)

wikitext.*:
'''Lord of the Piercing''' is a short 4 minute parody of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', created for the [[wikipedia:2002 MTV Movie Awards|2002 MTV Movie Awards]]. It was broadcast [[6 June|June 6]], [[2002]]. 

The parody was also included as an easter egg on the American [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|Extended Edition]] release of ''The Fellowship of the Ring''.<ref>{{Webcite|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0331560/trivia/|articlename=Lord of the Piercing: Trivia|website=Imdb}}</ref>
==Plot==
The parody features Jack Black and Sarah Michelle Gellar at the [[Council of Elrond]]. When asked to bring forth [[the One Ring]], Jack confesses that while drunk, he got it pierced to his private parts. He demonstrates this by pulling down his trousers. A discussion then ensues, after which Gellar's character rips off the Ring.
